page.title: 12 A DENTON CRAFT ENTERPRISE
page.content: (cont'd from P.11) I already made stoneware pottery,and I decided to try making more decorative items in porcelain. I had pressed flowers for many years and I now made these into jewellery, paperweights and pictures. For nine months I built up a stock of pottery, cushions, patchwork, pressed flower goods ,rag dolls and hobby horses,all of which I made myself.I revived my interest in screen printing and learned how to assemble jewellery from beads and components.I bought potpourris and lavender in bulk and made more sachets,lavender dolls and herb pillows;and I dulled my enjoyment of macrame by producing several plant hangings and book marks.My husband was persuaded to turn some wooden bowls and lace bobbins. (cont'd on P.13)
